welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Finchley, a charming neighborhood known for its beautiful parks, vibrant local shops, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this city has to offer during your stay. Cheers to a memorable experience!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, primarily used by British Airways and other Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, used by most European airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal for long-haul flights, used by a variety of airlines including American Airlines and Emirates.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, used mainly by SkyTeam and other non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The exclusive terminal for British Airways, with luxury lounges and amenities.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal at Luton Airport, mainly used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require periodic re-connection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is connected to the main terminal and serves mainly low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the main terminal for international flights and is home to a variety of shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport primarily serves domestic and European flights and offers a range of amenities including duty-free shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
